name: files.remote.list
desc: Retrieve information about a remote file added to Slack

channel.desc: Filter files appearing in a specific channel, indicated by its ID.

cursor.desc: Paginate through collections of data by setting the cursor parameter to a next_cursor attribute returned by a previous request's response_metadata. Default value fetches the first "page" of the collection. See pagination for more detail.

limit.desc: The maximum number of items to return.

ts_from.desc: Filter files created after this timestamp (inclusive).

ts_to.desc: Filter files created before this timestamp (inclusive).

errors.invalid_cursor: Value passed for `cursor` was not valid or is no longer valid.
errors.no_bot_user_for_app: Cannot call the Remote Files endpoints unless app has associated bot user
